original: su ra ta stvam aa la la la ho /

translated: Having meditated in this way, from the mouth of the moon-disk at the heart of the Lord of the World, which is in the form of a rosary, a white [syllable] A arises,

original: lte bar 'jug cing 'khor lo 'khor ba'i sbyor bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po yid bzhin gyi nor bu rtog pa sngags kyi rgyal po 'di bzlas par bya'o //

translated: and having entered the navel, by the yoga of the revolving wheel, one should recite this king of mantras, the wish-fulfilling jewel, the essence of all the Buddhas.

original: de nas 'khor zhing 'dug pa la sogs pa thob nas /
analyzed: de nas 'khor zhing 'dug pa la sogs pa thob nas /
translated: Then, having attained the state of wandering and sitting, etc.,🔽the yogi who is endowed with faith and compassion and is devoted to the guru will soon attain [success].🔽 One should recite the mantra Om mani padme hum.🔽 Then, at the time of rising, one should recite this mantra and remain [in meditation]:🔽 Om vajrasattva samayam anupalaya,🔽 vajrasattva tvenopatistha,🔽 dridho me bhava sutoṣyo,🔽 mahaiśvasta siddhi raho,🔽 samayas tvam kuru hūṃ,🔽 ha ha ha ha hoḥ,🔽 bhagavān vajrī vajra amṛta kuṇḍali,🔽 bhava bhava su bhava,🔽 māraya māraya,🔽  Translation: A: A: A: A:  Recite this consecration mantra.🔽Having meditated in this way, from the mouth of the moon-disk at the heart of the Lord of the World, which is in the form of a rosary, a white [syllable] A arises,🔽and having entered the navel, by the yoga of the revolving wheel, one should recite this king of mantras, the wish-fulfilling jewel, the essence of all the Buddhas.🔽Then, having attained the state of wandering and sitting, etc.,

original: dad pa dang snying rje dang ldan pa bla ma la gus pa'i rnal 'byor pas dus mi ring bar 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dad pa dang snying rje dang ldan pa bla ma la gus pa'i rnal 'byor pas dus mi ring bar 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: the yogi who is endowed with faith and compassion and is devoted to the guru will soon attain [success].

original: aom ma ni padme h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: aom ma ni padme h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas par bya'o //
translated: One should recite the mantra Om mani padme hum.

original: de nas ldang ba'i dus su sngags 'di brjod de gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas ldang ba'i dus su sngags 'di brjod de gnas par bya'o //
translated: Then, at the time of rising, one should recite this mantra and remain [in meditation]:🔽 Om vajrasattva samayam anupalaya,🔽 vajrasattva tvenopatistha,

original: aom badzra satva sa ma ya ma nu p'a la ya /

original: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
